sentences.sContent: I am sometimes accused of being a poseur.
sentences.sCn: 我有时被人说成是一个装模作样的人。

synos.tran: 装模作样的人；装腔作势的人

words.tran: 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事

trans.tranCn: 装模作样的人, 装腔作势的人
trans.tranOther: You can describe someone as a poseur when you think that they behave in an insincere or exaggerated way because they want to make a particular impression on other people
